Package com.github.seqware.queryengine.plugins.hbasemr

Provides classes that support and implement hbase implementations of plug-ins.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractMRHBaseBatchedPlugin This plug-in abstracts plug-ins that use a model manager to keep track of Features that "pass" the mapper
AbstractMRHBasePlugin<ReturnType> Abstract implementation of an abstract map/reduce-based plug-in for a HBase back-end.
MRFeaturesAllPlugin Implements the "get all features in a feature set" query
MRFeaturesByAttributesPlugin Implements the tag queries
MRFeaturesByFilterPlugin Implements the generic queries which independently decide on whether a Feature is included in a result.
MRFeaturesByRangePlugin Implements queries by range operations
MRFeaturesByTagsPlugin Implements queries by range operations
MRFeatureSetCountPlugin Counts the number of Features in a FeatureSet
MRVCFDumperPlugin This plug-in implements a quick and dirty export using Map/Reduce TODO: Copy from HDFS and parse key value file to VCF properly.
QEMapper<KEYOUT,VALUEOUT> Base mapper class used by all Query Engine plug-ins.
QEReducer<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT> Base reducer class used by all plug-ins.
 

Package com.github.seqware.queryengine.plugins.hbasemr Description

Provides classes that support and implement hbase implementations of plug-ins.
